description:
The investment seeks to match two times the inverse (-2x) of the daily performance of the gold bullion as measured by the U.S. dollar p.m. LBMA Gold Price.
The fund seeks to meet its investment objective by investing under normal market conditions in any one of, or combinations of, Financial Instruments (including swap agreements, futures contracts and forward contracts) based on the fund’s benchmark. It may invest up to 100% of its assets in any of these types of cash or cash equivalent securities.
